properties.name: bot.usedLanguages
properties.description: Language tags used for loading resource bundles into ResourceBundleFactory.

properties.name: bot.bot-token
properties.description: Telegram bot token, can be received from @BotFather.

properties.description: Click provider token that can be receiver from @BotFather.

properties.name: payment.payme-token
properties.description: Payme provider token that can be receiver from @BotFather.

properties.name: app.basket-count-limit
properties.description: Max count limit for each item in basket.

properties.name: app.free-delivery-lower-bound
properties.description: Lower bound order price for free delivery.
